Key Match Events: Jalen Green finally scored his first point from the free-throw line after getting fouled in the paint.
Thompson made an immediate impact in the third quarter, scoring seven points and putting constant pressure on the defense, especially at the rim.
Pre-Game Insights: Ime Udoka spoke to the media regarding Steven Adams' availability for the next game, Amen Thompson's importance to the team, and his expectations for Friday's match.
Coach Udoka wants Jalen Green to drive to the basket more and apply pressure on the defense.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Udoka mentioned that Eason and Thompson complement each other's game and make their teammates better.
Udoka also mentioned that Thompson had eight turnovers, but helped turn the Rockets deficit into a 128-108 win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets will look to replicate Friday night's second-half performance for 48 minutes on Saturday night when they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs.
Coach Udoka and the coaching staff realize that Thompson does a little bit of everything on the court.
Others: Jalen Green finished with 22 points six rebounds and four assists.
Tari Eason finished with 13 points, five rebounds, and shot 3-for-4 from beyond the arc.
